![](https://cityofcombes.com/city-departments/municipal-court/court-clerk.jpg)

The Municipal Court is the judicial branch of the Town of Combes' government. Dedicated to overseeing justice in a fair, timely and efficient manner, the court also coordinates the town's accounting and budgetary functions.

The court clerk is Anel Velasquez. She is responsible for performing the administrative duties that ensure proper court operation. You can contact her regarding any issues between normal business working hours. Contact: (956) 425-7131

* [Municipal Court Information](https://cityofcombes.com/city-departments/municipal-court/Municipal-Court-Information.pdf)
* [Corte Municipal Informacion](https://cityofcombes.com/city-departments/municipal-court/Corte-Municipal-Informacion.pdf)

Judges are available Monday and Thursday at 5:00 p.m.

Judge Ruben Ochoa

![](https://cityofcombes.com/city-departments/municipal-court/judge-ruben-ochoa.jpg)

You can pay your fines at the Town of Combes Municipal Complex Room by check, money order, cash or credit card. All payments incur a ($3.00 convenience fee).



City of Combes
